| History                 = The Bratva Boys were a [[Russia]]n gang that operated in the [[Meatpacking District]].

The [[Felicia Hardy (Earth-616)|Black Cat]] sent members of her [[Black Cat's Gang (Earth-616)|gang]] to the bar [[Crossroads (Bar)|Crossroads]] to ambush them. Fortunately for the Bratva Boys, [[James Howlett (Earth-21923)|Logan]] was present at the bar drinking with [[Peter Quill (Earth-616)|Star-Lord]], and attacked the gang member ordered to begin the attack. However, the situation escalated to a bar fight. The Bravta Boys seemed to have fled the scene at some point while Logan and Star-Lord continued fighting Black Cat's gang.{{r|Star-Lord Vol 2 1}}
